CheckTitle: Cloud Storage buckets have Object Versioning enabled
Description: Google Cloud Storage buckets are evaluated to ensure that Object Versioning is enabled.
Risk: Buckets without Object Versioning enabled cannot recover previous object versions after accidental deletion or overwrites.

Code.Other:
1) Open Google Cloud Console -> Storage -> Buckets
2) Select the bucket
3) Click 'Edit bucket' -> 'Protection'
4) Enable 'Object versioning'
5) Save

Recommendation.Text: Enable Object Versioning on Cloud Storage buckets to protect against accidental data loss.
